Detailed Description

ControllerParams are used by widgets to tell their parents how they want to be laid out.

The base ControllerParams class just describes how big the widget wants to be for both width and height.

Definition at line 21 of file ControllerParams.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum
Enumerator:
FILL_PARENT 

Special value for the height or width requested by a View.

FILL_PARENT and MATCH_PARENT means that the view wants to be as big as its parent, minus the parent's padding, if any.

MATCH_PARENT 
WRAP_CONTENT 

Special value for the height or width requested by a View.

WRAP_CONTENT means that the view wants to be just large enough to fit its own internal content, taking its own padding into account.
